channel.title: Sort of new to timers need a little help
channel.description:
Hey i'm kinda new to timers & delays etc and i was wondering, how would i make a delay so on my perfect teleports which i'm making it does the animation/emote but doesn't actually teleport until "X" Seconds/milli seconds have passed.
Ty.
